verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096> when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> had finished<WG5055> commanding<WG1299> his<WG846> twelve<WG1427> disciples<WG3101>, he departed<WG3327> thence<WG1564> to teach<WG1321> and<WG2532> preach<WG2784> in<WG1722> their<WG846> cities<WG4172>.
Now when<WG1161> John<WG2491> heard<WG191> in<WG1722> the prison<WG1201> the works<WG2041> of the Christ<WG5547>, he sent<WG3992> by<WG1417> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>
and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, art<WG1488> thou<WG4771> he that comes<WG2064>, or<WG2228> look we for<WG4328> another<WG2087>?
And Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Go<WG4198> and tell<WG518> John<WG2491> the<WG518> things which<WG3739> you hear<WG191> and<WG2532> see<WG991>:

the blind<WG5185> receive their sight<WG308>, and<WG2532> the lame<WG5560> walk<WG4043>, the lepers<WG3015> are cleansed<WG2511>, and<WG2532> the deaf<WG2974> hear<WG191>, and the dead<WG3498> are raised up<WG1453>, and<WG2532> the poor<WG4434> have good tidings preached to them<WG2097>.
And <WG2532> blessed<WG3107> is<WG2076> he<WG3739>, whosoever<WG1437> shall<WG4624> find no<WG3361> occasion of stumbling<WG4624> in<WG1722> me<WG1698>.

And as<WG1161> these<WG5130> went their way<WG4198>, Jesus<WG2424> began<WG756> to say<WG3004> unto the multitudes<WG3793> concerning<WG4012> John<WG2491>, What<WG5101> went ye out<WG1831> into<WG1519> the wilderness<WG2048> to behold<WG2300>? a reed<WG2563> shaken<WG4531> with<WG5259> the wind<WG417>?

But <WG235> what<WG5101> went ye out<WG1831> to see<WG1492>? a man<WG444> clothed<WG294> in<WG1722> soft<WG3120> clothes<WG2440>? Behold<WG2400>, they that<WG3588> wear<WG5409> soft<WG3120> clothes are<WG1526> in<WG1722> kings<WG935>' houses<WG3624>.
But <WG235> why<WG5101> went ye out<WG1831>? to see<WG1492> a prophet<WG4396>? Yea<WG3483>, I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> much more than<WG4053> a prophet<WG4396>.

This <WG3778> is<WG2076> he<WG4012>, of whom<WG3739> it is written<WG1125>, Behold<WG2400>, I<WG1473> send<WG649> my<WG3450> messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> thy<WG4675> face<WG4383>, Who<WG3739> shall prepare<WG2680> thy<WG4675> way<WG3598> before<WG1715> thee<WG4675>.

Verily <WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, Among<WG1722> them that are born<WG1084> of women<WG1135> there has<WG1453> not<WG3756> arisen<WG1453> a greater than<WG3187> John<WG2491> the Baptist<WG910>: yet<WG1161> he that is but little<WG3398> in<WG1722> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> is<WG2076> greater than<WG3187> he<WG846>.

And <WG1161> from<WG575> the days<WG2250> of John<WG2491> the Baptist<WG910> until<WG2193> now<WG737> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> suffereth violence<WG971>, and<WG2532> men of violence<WG973> take<WG726> it<WG846> by force<WG726>.
For <WG1063> all<WG3956> the prophets<WG4396> and<WG2532> the law<WG3551> prophesied<WG4395> until<WG2193> John<WG2491>.
And <WG2532> if<WG1487> you are willing<WG2309> to receive<WG1209> it<WG846>, this is<WG2076> Elijah<WG2243>, that<WG3588> is<WG3195> to come<WG2064>.
He that has<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear<WG191>, let him hear<WG191>.

But <WG1161> whereunto<WG5101> shall I compare<WG3666> this<WG3778> generation<WG1074>? It is<WG2076> like unto<WG3664> sons<WG3808> sitting<WG2521> in<WG1722> the marketplaces<WG58>, who<WG2532> call unto<WG4377> their<WG846> fellows<WG3664>
and <WG2532> say<WG3004>, We piped<WG832> unto you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> ye did not<WG3756> dance<WG3738>; we wailed<WG2354>, and<WG2532> ye did<WG2875> not<WG3756> mourn<WG2875>.
For <WG1063> John<WG2491> came<WG2064> neither<WG3383> eating<WG2068> nor<WG3383> drinking<WG4095>, and<WG2532> they say<WG3004>, He hath<WG2192> a demon<WG1140>.

The Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> came<WG2064> eating<WG2068> and<WG2532> drinking<WG4095>, and<WG2532> they say<WG3004>, Behold<WG2400>, a gluttonous<WG5314> man<WG444> and<WG2532> a winebibber<WG3630>, a friend<WG5384> of tax collectors<WG5057> and<WG2532> sinners<WG268>! And<WG2532> wisdom<WG4678> is justified<WG1344> by<WG575> her<WG846> works<WG5043>.

Then <WG5119> began he<WG756> to upbraid<WG3679> the cities<WG4172> where<WG3739> most<WG4118> of<WG1411> his<WG846> mighty works<WG1411> were done<WG1096>, because<WG3754> they repented<WG3340> not<WG3756>.

Woe <WG3759> unto thee<WG4671>, Chorazin<WG5523>! woe<WG3759> unto thee<WG4671>, Bethsaida<WG966>! for<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> which were done<WG1096> in<WG1722> you<WG5213>, they<WG3340> would have<WG302> repented<WG3340> long ago<WG3819> in<WG1722> sackcloth<WG4526> and<WG2532> ashes<WG4700>.

But <WG4133> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, it shall be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of judgment<WG2920> than<WG2228> for you<WG5213>.

And <WG2532> you<WG4771>, Capernaum<WG2584>, shall you be exalted<WG5312> unto<WG2193> heaven<WG3772>? you shall go down<WG2601> unto<WG2193> Hades<WG86>: for<WG3754> if<WG1487> the mighty works<WG1411> had been done<WG1096> in<WG1722> Sodom<WG4670> which were done<WG1096> in<WG1722> thee<WG4671>, it<WG3306> would have<WG302> remained<WG3306> until<WG3360> this day<WG4594>.

But <WG4133> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213> that<WG3754> it shall be<WG2071> more tolerable<WG414> for the land<WG1093> of Sodom<WG4670> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of judgment<WG2920>, than<WG2228> for thee<WG4671>.

At <WG1722> that<WG1565> season<WG2540> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, I thank<WG1843> thee<WG4671>, O Father<WG3962>, Lord<WG2962> of heaven<WG3772> and<WG2532> earth<WG1093>, that<WG3754> you did hide<WG613> these things<WG5023> from<WG575> the wise<WG4680> and<WG2532> understanding<WG4908>, and<WG2532> did reveal<WG601> them<WG846> unto babes<WG3516>:
Yes <WG3483>, Father<WG3962>, for<WG3754> so<WG3779> it was<WG1096> well-pleasing<WG2107> in<WG1715> thy sight<WG4675>.

All things<WG3956> have been delivered<WG3860> unto me<WG3427> of<WG5259> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>: and<WG2532> no one<WG3762> knows<WG1921> the Son<WG5207>, save<WG1487> the<WG3361> Father<WG3962>; neither<WG3761> does any<WG5100> know<WG1921> the Father<WG3962>, save<WG1487> the<WG3361> Son<WG5207>, and<WG2532> he to whomever<WG3739> the<WG1437> Son<WG5207> willeth<WG1014> to reveal him<WG601>.
Come <WG1205> unto<WG4314> me<WG3165>, all<WG3956> ye that labor<WG2872> and<WG2532> are heavy laden<WG5412>, and I<WG2504> will give<WG373> you<WG5209> rest<WG373>.

Take <WG142> my<WG3450> yoke<WG2218> upon<WG1909> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> learn<WG3129> of<WG575> me<WG1700>; for<WG3754> I am<WG1510> meek<WG4235> and<WG2532> lowly<WG5011> in heart<WG2588>: and<WG2532> ye shall find<WG2147> rest<WG372> unto<WG5590> your<WG5216> souls<WG5590>.
For <WG1063> my<WG3450> yoke<WG2218> is easy<WG5543>, and<WG2532> my<WG3450> burden<WG5413> is<WG2076> light<WG1645>.
